blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.name: bounding-heart

blog.description: Gryffindor, bi-sexual, old, feminist, over-emotional and unashamed, anti-antis. It's a good idea to read my 'about me' before following. Only over 18s, please.

summary: It’s like, I’m sick to death of people saying “You just can’t handle any criticism of X” when that isn’t the issue at all. The...
body: It’s like, I’m sick to death of people saying “You just can’t handle any criticism of X” when that isn’t the issue at all. The issue is that these people are behaving like piranhas.

summary: You know... I am sure there are lot of posts like this but like.... I love Harry Potter fandom so much... Like it continues to...
body:
You know… I am sure there are lot of posts like this but like…. I love Harry Potter fandom so much… Like it continues to grow and there are so many beautiful headcannons whether it’s about marauders, jily, or just random things about houses. Sometimes when I am down these things really change my day!! And guys thank you… For sharing your ideas, fics and headcannons and edits. Please continue this good work and know that people like me appreciate you so much!!

PS: this many feels cause I just rewatched Harry Potter COS and yeah, movies get me like this every damn time.. Ok, bye

summary: THE NIFFLER INTRODUCE DOTTIE LOVETT oh dear salazar, dottie lovett is another coming out of nowhere or well no where we want to...
caption:
THE NIFFLER INTRODUCE DOTTIE LOVETT

oh dear salazar, dottie lovett is another coming out of nowhere or well no where we want to think about. dear old mommy was a squib, but we hear she’s no longer around, don’t worry dot it’s gonna be just fine. we mean, we’ve heard you’re looking for adventure and some fun, we might just be able to arrange you one, just remember not to bite.

summary: THE NIFFLER INTRODUCE JAI SINGH oh, jai singh, this one. ladies, better lock up your hearts. who doesn't want a piece of this...
caption:
THE NIFFLER INTRODUCE JAI SINGH

oh, jai singh, this one. ladies, better lock up your hearts. who doesn’t want a piece of this ridiculous child? he might dress well, but that’s the only thing put together about him. a nice evening with him will probably be spent in detention, or on some wacky adventure that he drags you along on. just what every girl dreams of, right?

The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
